description:
This course is based upon my years of networking experience, you will learn smart networking and how to think outside the box, this will help to grow your business, as well as your reputation.

This course is for anyone who is thinking about networking, or already networking, there is always something new to learn.

This course is structured from making sure you are ready for networking to running your own group.

This is presented by power point with narration to guide and educate you.

If you have been putting off networking because you were unsure what it is all about, this course will educate you on what you need to know.

This will show you the many ways of growing your business and that networking is not all about YOU, it's actually about the other people in the group, which is a common mistake many people make when getting onto the networking scene.

This course will allow you to network in a professional manner and gain the most from your networking experience.

This course has 13 lectures and over 1.5 hours of content
title: Is Networking, Working for you? What you need to know
